## The fully-connected layer vs convolutional layer in Generative CNNs. 

Modeling phonological acquisition using GANs. The WaveGAN generator has a relatively simple and small architecture that is useful for model interpretability.

Latent variables encode lexical items in their FC weight matrices. 


The FC-layer can be thought of as a feature map factory that produces feature maps to then be interpreted by temporally-constrained convolutional layers.
